description: This file contains mock class definitions for the SyscfgInterface used in unit testing, specifically leveraging Google Test and Google Mock frameworks.

classes.name: SyscfgInterface
classes.description: An interface class for system configuration operations, providing pure virtual methods for init, commit, get, and set.

classes.name: SyscfgMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of SyscfgInterface for testing purposes, utilizing Google Mock to stub method behaviors.

methods.name: SyscfgInterface::SyscfgInit
methods.description: Pure virtual method for initializing system configuration.

methods.name: SyscfgInterface::SyscfgCommit
methods.description: Pure virtual method for committing system configuration changes.

methods.name: SyscfgInterface::SyscfgGet
methods.description: Pure virtual method for retrieving configuration values.

methods.name: SyscfgInterface::SyscfgSet
methods.description: Pure virtual method for setting configuration values.

methods.name: SyscfgMock::SyscfgInit
methods.description: Mocked method for initializing system configuration.

methods.name: SyscfgMock::SyscfgCommit
methods.description: Mocked method for committing system configuration.

methods.name: SyscfgMock::SyscfgGet
methods.description: Mocked method for retrieving configuration values.

methods.name: SyscfgMock::SyscfgSet
methods.description: Mocked method for setting configuration values.
